review_blob: I lifted a glass of Puzzle to my lips and was astonished to discover that it smelled of Earl Grey tea.  I was even more astonished to discover that it also tastes of Earl Grey tea.  Strong floral overtones, probably from bergamot.  One of the most unusual beers I've ever tasted, but a very fine one.  (Cask at Coventry Beef Festival 2004)
